content:
Is there a way to write equations in Julia markdown like this one image.png

I cannot figure out how to add line breaks since the normal \\ doesn't seem to work and I can't find much documentation for latex in Julia with md""" """
Hmm. Using \\ seems to work for me in IJulia, but only without alignment. markers.
I will have to try again but maybe it's a problem with Pluto and markdown. I will check and report back
Must be a problem with Pluto if this works elsewhere. I will move this to the Pluto stream
